name: Qualcomm Mobile Data Log
summary: Learn about .QMDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Qualcomm mobile devices save a record of the data packets they've sent over a network in QMDL files. Developers and network administrators can use these files to troubleshoot issues with a device, app, or network. To analyze these files, users either submit the files to Qualcomm or view their contents with Qualcomm eXtensible Diagnostic Monitor.

instructions: You can open a QMDL file with Qualcomm eXtensible Diagnostic Monitor (Windows). This program, which is also known as QXDM, is available for purchase from Qualcomm.
You can use Scat (multiplatform) to convert QMDL files to the .PCAP format. You can then open the converted files with Wireshark to view their contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
